ygData.subject: Re: Frustration Story (OT - Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: Luckily I havent had a large dying episode lately.  I am well known in my guild for dying way too often =).  The last big run was dying 4 time in Cazic Thule.
ygData.messageBody:
Luckily I havent had a large dying episode lately. I am well known in my
guild for dying way too often =). The last big run was dying 4 time in
Cazic Thule. BTW having a slow computer can suck just as bad.

Skeletal Monk hits you for 40
Loading please wait...
You are in Greater Faydark

Apparently the server let's you linger in the zone you are zoning from. I
have died that way to a DVinn in my younger days. Zone with 2 bubbles and
appear in my at my bind point.

Treilanin Loreweaver

On Mon, 23 Aug 1999, John Kim wrote:

> From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
> Damn, was last night everyone's night to die multiple times?
> I had my first triple-death night since I was trying to help
> someone find and retrieve their corpse in Runnyeye 5 levels
> ago. Barely held onto 32. I made the mistake of running back
> to Cazic without a flute, and ended up stuck at the zone with
> a train on one side and a bouncer on the other. Sometimes
> having a fast computer that zones quickly is not a good
> thing...
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
